scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
